snippet: Here is an exhibition of Marco Rios’s own childhood artwork, done between the ages of 3 and 5.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews Marco Rios exhibit S Is for Sincere, Formerly Formally F Is for Fake at Simon Preston gallery.
lead_paragraph: Here is an exhibition of Marco Rios’s own childhood artwork, done between the ages of 3 and 5.

headline.print_headline: Marco Rios: ‘"S” Is for Sincere, Formerly Formally “F” Is for Fake’
headline.main: Marco Rios: ‘"S” Is for Sincere, Formerly Formally “F” Is for Fake’
